live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.

60908.summary: Some customers in Kildonan Crossing area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60908.title: May 8 - Winnipeg (Kildonan Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
